application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T17 Variegated Holly (x1) - Reduce height by 3m down to a final height of 4m and reduce width by approximately 1m all around. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size.T18 Red Oak (x1) - Fell to ground level. Reason: Poor, stunted specimen leaning over No.20. T19 Lime (x1) - Reduce height by 3m down to a height of 8m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size.T20 Holly (x1) - Reduce height down to 4m. Final height and width to be 4m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size.T21&22 Holm Oaks (x2) - Reduce height by 4m down to a height of 8m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size.T24 English Oak (x1) - Reduce crown by 3m all around. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size.
